Package org.odpi.openmetadata.adapters.connectors.governanceactions.notifications

package org.odpi.openmetadata.adapters.connectors.governanceactions.notifications
Supports simple notification service based different criteria. These notification services run in a Watchdog engine.
  • Class
    Description
    MonitoredElements
    Manage the list of monitored elements and support queries.
    MonitoredResourceNotificationService
    MonitoredResourceNotificationService is a Watchdog Governance Action Service that listens for changes to its monitored resources and notifies its subscribers when a change occurs.
    MonitoredResourceNotificationServiceProvider
    MonitoredResourceNotificationServiceProvider is the OCF connector provider for the MonitoredResourceNotificationService.
    OneTimeNotificationService
    OneTimeNotificationService is a Watchdog Governance Action Service notifies its subscribers once and then completes.
    OneTimeNotificationServiceProvider
    OneTimeNotificationServiceProvider is the OCF connector provider for the OneTimeNotificationService.
    OpenMetadataNotificationMessageSet
    The OpenMetadataNotificationMessageSet is used to define the message content for the notifications.
    PeriodicRefreshNotificationService
    PeriodicRefreshNotificationService is a Watchdog Governance Action Service that periodically calls the subscribers.
    PeriodicRefreshNotificationServiceProvider
    PeriodicRefreshNotificationServiceProvider is the OCF connector provider for the PeriodicRefreshNotificationService.
    PeriodicRefreshRequestParameter
    PeriodicRefreshRequestParameter provides some standard definitions for request parameters used to pass properties to governance actions when they run.
